episodes.name: Pain vs Love
episodes.overview: How did a kid from New York transform himself into a powerful hip-hop mogul? The origins of Bad Boy Records reveal how Sean Combs became Puff Daddy.

episodes.name: What Goes Down Must Come Up
episodes.overview: As Puffy embraces the celebrity lifestyle, he fuels a dangerous rivalry with Death Row Records. Questions linger about the shooting of Tupac Shakur.

episodes.name: Official Girl
episodes.overview: After Biggie's death, Diddy's career skyrockets alongside a string of violent incidents. Alarming allegations emerge about abusive relationships.

episodes.name: Blink Again
episodes.overview: Combs' accusers step forward with shocking claims of abuse, triggering a federal investigation that leads to his 2024 arrest and high-profile trial.
